amendment.description: An amendment numbered 101 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funding to finalize, implement, or enforce the FAR Council's proposed "Federal Acquisition Regulation: Disclosure of Greenhouse Gas Emissions and Climate-Related Financial Risk" rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A067) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 202 (Roll no. 642).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A067) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 202 (Roll no. 642).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
